meanings.definition: A barbiturate drug used as a sedative or hypnotic.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed pentobarbitone to help the patient relax before surgery.
meanings.sent2: She took a dose of pentobarbitone to help her fall asleep quickly.
meanings.sent3: The pentobarbitone made the anxious cat doze off peacefully.
meanings.sent4: The pentobarbitone wrapped the mind in a gentle blanket of calm.
meanings.sent5: The pentobarbitone whispered sweet dreams into her ears.

meanings.definition: To administer pentobarbitone to induce sleep or sedation.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will pentobarbitone the patient before the procedure.
meanings.sent2: He pentobarbitoned the restless child to help them rest.
meanings.sent3: The magician pentobarbitoned the audience into a deep slumber.
meanings.sent4: The music pentobarbitoned his mind, lulling him into a peaceful state.
meanings.sent5: She gently pentobarbitoned the room, calming all who entered.
